subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Five weeks ago, Coach Gregg Popovich was fined for sitting his top players for the Spurs’ fourth game in five days. Against the Knicks, after a similar stretch, Popovich opted to keep his lineup intact.
snippet: Five weeks ago, Coach Gregg Popovich was fined for sitting his top players for the Spurs’ fourth game in five days. Against the Knicks, after a similar stretch, Popovich opted to keep his lineup intact.
